Ingredients: 75 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express orange zest twist over cocktail and discard. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
Review: Fantastically complex with notes of rum, maraschino, sherry and orange.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2008 by Scott Ingram at MC Bar, Abode Hotel in Glasgow, Scotland. The name is a reference to the year when Facundo M. Bacardi established his first distillery.
